Package com.flipkart.dao

Interface FLipFitGymOwnerDAOInterface

All Known Implementing Classes:
FlipFitGymOwnerDAOImpl
public interface FLipFitGymOwnerDAOInterface
This interface defines methods to manage gym owners and their gyms in the FlipFit application.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description

    addSlot(int gymId, String date, String startTime, String endTime, int noOfSeats)
    Adds a new slot (time slot) for booking at a specific gym on a given date.

    Creates a new gym owner with the provided details.

    Edits the details of an existing gym.

  • Method Details

    • createGymOwner

      void createGymOwner(String ownerName, String ownerPhone, String ownerAddress, String ownerGstNum, String ownerPanNum, int ownerId)
      Creates a new gym owner with the provided details.
      Parameters:
      ownerName - The name of the gym owner.
      ownerPhone - The phone number of the gym owner.
      ownerAddress - The address of the gym owner.
      ownerGstNum - The GST number of the gym owner.
      ownerPanNum - The PAN number of the gym owner.
      ownerId - The unique ID of the gym owner.

    • editProfile

      void editProfile(String ownerName, String ownerPhone, String ownerAddress, String ownerGstNum, String ownerPanNum, int ownerId)
      Edits the profile details of an existing gym owner.
      Parameters:
      ownerName - The updated name of the gym owner.
      ownerPhone - The updated phone number of the gym owner.
      ownerAddress - The updated address of the gym owner.
      ownerGstNum - The updated GST number of the gym owner.
      ownerPanNum - The updated PAN number of the gym owner.
      ownerId - The unique ID of the gym owner.

    • registerGym

      void registerGym(int gymOwnerId, String gymName, String gymAddress)
      Registers a new gym under an existing gym owner.
      Parameters:
      gymOwnerId - The ID of the gym owner registering the gym.
      gymName - The name of the gym.
      gymAddress - The address of the gym.

    • editGym

      void editGym(int gymId, int gymOwnerId, String gymName, String gymAddress, int noOfSlots)
      Edits the details of an existing gym.
      Parameters:
      gymId - The ID of the gym to be edited.
      gymOwnerId - The ID of the gym owner who owns the gym.
      gymName - The updated name of the gym.
      gymAddress - The updated address of the gym.
      noOfSlots - The updated number of available slots in the gym.

    • removeGym

      void removeGym(int gymId)
      Removes a gym from the system.
      Parameters:
      gymId - The ID of the gym to be removed.

    • viewAllRegisteredGymCenters

      List<FlipFitGymDetails> viewAllRegisteredGymCenters(int userId)
      Retrieves a list of all gyms registered by a specific gym owner.
      Parameters:
      userId - The ID of the gym owner whose gyms are to be retrieved.
      Returns:
      A list of FlipFitGymDetails objects representing the gyms.

    • viewAllBookings

      List<Booking> viewAllBookings(int userId)
      Retrieves a list of all bookings made by a specific user.
      Parameters:
      userId - The ID of the user whose bookings are to be retrieved.
      Returns:
      A list of Booking objects representing the bookings.

    • viewBookings

      List<Booking> viewBookings(int gymId)
      Retrieves a list of all bookings made for a specific gym.
      Parameters:
      gymId - The ID of the gym for which bookings are to be retrieved.
      Returns:
      A list of Booking objects representing the bookings.

    • viewAvailableSlots

      List<SlotDetails> viewAvailableSlots(int gymId, String date)
      Retrieves a list of all available slots at a specific gym on a given date.
      Parameters:
      gymId - The ID of the gym for which the slot is being added.
      date - The date of the slot (in YYYY-MM-DD format).

    • addSlot

      void addSlot(int gymId, String date, String startTime, String endTime, int noOfSeats)
      Adds a new slot (time slot) for booking at a specific gym on a given date.
      Parameters:
      gymId - The ID of the gym for which the slot is being added.
      date - The date of the slot (in YYYY-MM-DD format).
      startTime - The start time of the slot (in HH:MM format).
      endTime - The end time of the slot (in HH:MM format).
      noOfSeats - The number of available seats in the slot.

    • removeSlot

      void removeSlot(int gymId, int slotId)
      Removes a specific slot from a gym's schedule.
      Parameters:
      gymId - The ID of the gym from which the slot is to be removed.
      slotId - The ID of the slot to be removed.
